title: First Day Jitters
description: Your first remote meeting. Thankfully, people are forgiving.

dialogues.text: Welcome to the quarterly review meeting.  We have lots to discuss today.
Hey everyone!  I'm super excited to share our Q4 results!
Before we begin, I would like to emphasize how important it is to listen carefully.
Let's synergize our efforts and leverage our core competencies going forward. Any questions?
Wojak, are you with us? You look a bit uncomfortable.
What do you think is the most important deliverable for today?

options: I believe the quarterly report is our top priority.
We should focus on the marketing strategy first.
Let's get the budget forecast finalized.
Team performance metrics need our attention.

dialogues.text: HAHAHA, that's so funny! I can't believe that happened!
As I was saying, our quarterly numbers are looking promising.
I've been working on the blockchain initiative with the marketing team. The results are interesting.
Wojak, which team is behind the blockchain initiative?

options: The marketing team has been leading that effort.
That was our development team's project.
It was initiated by our CEO directly.
The CTO's team has been handling it.

dialogues.text: Can we leverage the AI framework before next week's deadline? It's urgent!
Hey Wojak, what do you think we should leverage for next week?

options: I think the AI framework would be most effective.
The blockchain framework has a lot of potential.
A hybrid approach would give us flexibility.
We should stick with our existing solution for now.

dialogues.text: Everyone needs to submit their reports by EOD. No exceptions!
When do you plan to submit your report, Wojak?

options: I'll make sure it's done by end of day.
I'll have it ready by the end of the week.
I can submit it tomorrow if needed.
I was planning for next Monday, if that works.

dialogues.text: Sorry about that, I'm coming down with something. Excuse me.
We should totally pivot with the new SaaS platform going forward! Right team? Anyone?
Let's wrap this up. Wojak, do you have anything to add?
Wojak, what's your take on our new strategy?

options: I fully support it, the direction is perfect.
It's quite innovative, I'm impressed.
I have some concerns about implementation.
We might need to iterate more before launch.

dialogues.text: That reminds me of last year's company retreat! So embarrassing!
I think we've covered everything for today. Great progress everyone!
Thank you all for attending. Meeting adjourned.
